00018 W.Analytics = function(acct_no, isPending, mode){
00019     // control info.
00020     this.version = '0.0.1';
00021     this.name = 'Analytics';
00022     // set profile ID
00023     _uacct = acct_no?acct_no:'UA-103181-8';
00024     // set service mode
00025     _userv = mode?mode:1;
00026     // start tracking
00027     this.start = function(){
00028         urchinTracker();
00029     };
00030 
00031     // auto-start if there's no pending requested
00032     if(!isPending) this.start();
00033 };
